00059 
00060 void AddBaseDirtyRect( INT32 iLeft, INT32 iTop, INT32 iRight, INT32 iBottom )
00061 {
00062       SGPRect aRect;
00063 
00064       if ( iLeft < 0 )
00065       {
00066             iLeft = 0;
00067       }
00068       if ( iLeft > SCREEN_WIDTH )
00069       {
00070             iLeft = SCREEN_WIDTH;
00071       }
00072 
00073 
00074       if ( iTop < 0 )
00075       {
00076             iTop = 0;
00077       }
00078       if ( iTop > SCREEN_HEIGHT )
00079       {
00080             iTop = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
00081       }
00082 
00083 
00084       if ( iRight < 0 )
00085       {
00086             iRight = 0;
00087       }
00088       if ( iRight > SCREEN_WIDTH )
00089       {
00090             iRight = SCREEN_WIDTH;
00091       }
00092 
00093 
00094       if ( iBottom < 0 )
00095       {
00096             iBottom = 0;
00097       }
00098       if ( iBottom > SCREEN_HEIGHT )
00099       {
00100             iBottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
00101       }
00102 
00103       if (  ( iRight - iLeft ) == 0 || ( iBottom - iTop ) == 0 )
00104       {
00105             return;
00106       }
00107 
00108 
00109       if((iLeft==gsVIEWPORT_START_X) &&
00110                   (iRight==gsVIEWPORT_END_X) &&
00111                   (iTop==gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y) &&
00112                   (iBottom==gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y))
00113       {
00114             gfViewportDirty=TRUE;
00115             return;
00116       }
00117 
00118       // Add to list
00119       aRect.iLeft       = iLeft;
00120       aRect.iTop        = iTop;
00121       aRect.iRight      = iRight;
00122       aRect.iBottom     = iBottom;
00123 
00124       InvalidateRegionEx( aRect.iLeft, aRect.iTop, aRect.iRight, aRect.iBottom, 0 );
00125 
00126 }
00127  
00128 BOOLEAN ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( )
00129 {
00130       if(gfViewportDirty)
00131       {
00132             //InvalidateRegion(gsVIEWPORT_START_X, gsVIEWPORT_START_Y, gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y);
00133             InvalidateScreen( );
00134             EmptyDirtyRectQueue();
00135             gfViewportDirty=FALSE;
00136             return(TRUE);
00137       }
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141       return( TRUE );
00142 }

00151 INT32 GetFreeBackgroundBuffer(void)
00152 {
00153 UINT32 uiCount;
00154 
00155       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBackSaves; uiCount++)
00156       {
00157             if((gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE) && (gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled==FALSE))
00158                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00159       }
00160 
00161 
00162       if(guiNumBackSaves < BACKGROUND_BUFFERS)
00163             return((INT32)guiNumBackSaves++);
00164 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00165       else
00166       {
00167             //else display an error message
00168             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ERROR! GetFreeBackgroundBuffer(): Trying to allocate more saves then there is room:  guiCurrentScreen = %d", guiCurrentScreen ) );
00169       }
00170 #endif
00171 
00172       return(-1);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void RecountBackgrounds(void)
00176 {
00177 INT32 uiCount;
00178 
00179       for(uiCount=guiNumBackSaves-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00180       {
00181             if((gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated) || (gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled))
00182             {
00183                   guiNumBackSaves=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00184                   break;
00185             }
00186       }
00187 }

00192 INT32 RegisterBackgroundRect(UINT32 uiFlags, INT16 *pSaveArea, INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sRight, INT16 sBottom)
00193 {
00194 UINT32 uiBufSize;
00195 INT32 iBackIndex;
00196 INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
00197 INT32 uiLeftSkip, uiRightSkip, uiTopSkip, uiBottomSkip;
00198 UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
00199 INT32  iTempX, iTempY;
00200 
00201 
00202       // Don't register if we are rendering and we are below the viewport
00203       //if ( sTop >= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y )
00204       //{
00205       //    return(-1 );
00206       //}
00207 
00208       ClipX1= gDirtyClipRect.iLeft;
00209       ClipY1= gDirtyClipRect.iTop;
00210       ClipX2= gDirtyClipRect.iRight;
00211       ClipY2= gDirtyClipRect.iBottom;
00212 
00213       usHeight = sBottom - sTop;
00214       usWidth  = sRight -  sLeft;
00215 
00216       //if((sClipLeft >= sClipRight) || (sClipTop >= sClipBottom))
00217       //    return(-1);
00218       iTempX = sLeft;
00219       iTempY = sTop;
00220 
00221       // Clip to rect
00222       uiLeftSkip=__min( ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
00223       uiRightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
00224       uiTopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
00225       uiBottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
00226 
00227       // check if whole thing is clipped
00228       if((uiLeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (uiRightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))     
00229             return(-1 );
00230 
00231       // check if whole thing is clipped
00232       if((uiTopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (uiBottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight))   
00233             return(-1 );
00234 
00235       // Set re-set values given based on clipping
00236       sLeft  = sLeft + (INT16)uiLeftSkip;
00237       sRight = sRight - (INT16)uiRightSkip;
00238       sTop   = sTop + (INT16)uiTopSkip;
00239       sBottom = sBottom - (INT16)uiBottomSkip;
00240 
00241 
00242 if ( sLeft == 192 || sLeft == 188 )
00243 {
00244   int i = 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247       if((iBackIndex=GetFreeBackgroundBuffer())==(-1))
00248             return(-1);
00249 
00250       memset(&gBackSaves[iBackIndex], 0, sizeof(BACKGROUND_SAVE));
00251 
00252       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].fZBuffer=FALSE;
00253 
00254       if(pSaveArea==NULL)
00255       {
00256             uiBufSize=((sRight-sLeft)*2)*(sBottom-sTop);
00257             
00258             if(uiBufSize==0)
00259                   return(-1);
00260             
00261             if ( uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT )
00262             {
00263                   if((gBackSaves[iBackIndex].pSaveArea = (INT16 *) MemAlloc(uiBufSize))==NULL)
00264                         return(-1);
00265             }
00266 
00267 
00268             if(uiFlags&BGND_FLAG_SAVE_Z)
00269             {
00270                   if((gBackSaves[iBackIndex].pZSaveArea = (INT16 *) MemAlloc(uiBufSize))==NULL)
00271                         return(-1);
00272                   gBackSaves[iBackIndex].fZBuffer=TRUE;
00273             }
00274 
00275             gBackSaves[iBackIndex].fFreeMemory=TRUE;
00276       }
00277       //else
00278       //    gBackSaves[iBackIndex].pSaveArea=pSaveArea;
00279 
00280       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].fAllocated=TRUE;
00281       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].uiFlags=uiFlags;
00282       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sLeft=sLeft;
00283       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sTop=sTop;
00284       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sRight=sRight;
00285       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sBottom=sBottom;
00286       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sWidth=(sRight-sLeft);
00287       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].sHeight=(sBottom-sTop);
00288       
00289       gBackSaves[iBackIndex].fFilled=FALSE;
00290 
00291       return(iBackIndex);
00292 }

00294 void SetBackgroundRectFilled( UINT32 uiBackgroundID )
00295 {
00296       gBackSaves[uiBackgroundID].fFilled=TRUE;
00297 
00298       AddBaseDirtyRect(gBackSaves[uiBackgroundID].sLeft, gBackSaves[uiBackgroundID].sTop,
00299                                                             gBackSaves[uiBackgroundID].sRight, gBackSaves[uiBackgroundID].sBottom);
00300 
00301 }

00303 BOOLEAN RestoreBackgroundRects(void)
00304 {
00305 UINT32 uiCount, uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00306 UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00307 
00308       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00309       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00310 
00311       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBackSaves; uiCount++)
00312       {
00313             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled && ( !gBackSaves[uiCount].fDisabled) )
00314             {
00315 
00316                   if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT )
00317                   {
00318                         if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
00319                         {
00320                               Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, (UINT16 *)gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea, gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth*2,
00321                                                 gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00322                                                 0, 0, 
00323                                                 gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth, gBackSaves[uiCount].sHeight);
00324 
00325                               AddBaseDirtyRect(gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft, gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop,
00326                                                                               gBackSaves[uiCount].sRight, gBackSaves[uiCount].sBottom);
00327 
00328                         }
00329                   }
00330                   else if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVE_Z )
00331                   {
00332                         if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer )
00333                         {
00334                               Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16*)gpZBuffer, uiDestPitchBYTES, (UINT16 *)gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea, gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth*2,
00335                                                 gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00336                                                 0, 0,
00337                                                 gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth, gBackSaves[uiCount].sHeight);
00338                         }
00339                   }
00340                   else
00341                   {
00342                         Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00343                                           (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00344                                           gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00345                                           gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00346                                           gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth, gBackSaves[uiCount].sHeight);
00347 
00348                         AddBaseDirtyRect(gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft, gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop,
00349                                                                               gBackSaves[uiCount].sRight, gBackSaves[uiCount].sBottom);
00350                   }
00351             }
00352 
00353       }
00354 
00355       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00356       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00357 
00358       EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00359 
00360       return(TRUE);
00361 }

00363 
00364 BOOLEAN EmptyBackgroundRects(void)
00365 {
00366       UINT32 uiCount;
00367 
00368       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBackSaves; uiCount++)
00369       {
00370             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled)
00371             {
00372                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=FALSE;
00373 
00374                   if(!(gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated) && (gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory==TRUE))
00375                   {
00376                         if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT )
00377                         {
00378                               if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
00379                               {
00380                                     MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea);
00381                               }
00382                         }
00383                         if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer)
00384                               MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea);
00385 
00386                         gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer=FALSE;
00387                         gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated=FALSE;
00388                         gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory=FALSE;
00389                         gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=FALSE;
00390                         gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea=NULL;
00391 
00392                         RecountBackgrounds();
00393                   }
00394             }
00395 
00396             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags&BGND_FLAG_SINGLE || gBackSaves[uiCount].fPendingDelete )
00397             {
00398                   if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory==TRUE)
00399                   {
00400                         if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT )
00401                         {
00402                               if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
00403                               {
00404                                     MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea);                           
00405                               }
00406                         }
00407 
00408                         if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer)
00409                               MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea);
00410                   }
00411 
00412                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer=FALSE;
00413                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated=FALSE;
00414                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory=FALSE;
00415                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=FALSE;
00416                   gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea=NULL;
00417                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fPendingDelete = FALSE;
00418 
00419                   RecountBackgrounds();
00420             }
00421       }
00422 
00423       return(TRUE);
00424 }

00427 BOOLEAN SaveBackgroundRects(void)
00428 {
00429 UINT32 uiCount, uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00430 UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00431 
00432       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00433       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00434 
00435       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBackSaves; uiCount++)
00436       {
00437             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated && ( !gBackSaves[uiCount].fDisabled) )
00438             {
00439                         if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags & BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT )
00440                         {
00441                               if ( gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
00442                               {
00443                                     Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea, gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth*2,
00444                                                       (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES,
00445                                                       0, 0, 
00446                                                       gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00447                                                       gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth, gBackSaves[uiCount].sHeight);
00448 
00449                               }
00450 
00451                         }                 
00452                         else if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer)
00453                         {
00454                               Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea, gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth*2, 
00455                                           (UINT16 *)gpZBuffer, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00456                                           0, 0, 
00457                                           gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft , gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop, 
00458                                           gBackSaves[uiCount].sWidth, gBackSaves[uiCount].sHeight);
00459                         }
00460                         else
00461                         {
00462                               AddBaseDirtyRect(gBackSaves[uiCount].sLeft, gBackSaves[uiCount].sTop,
00463                                                                   gBackSaves[uiCount].sRight, gBackSaves[uiCount].sBottom);
00464                         }
00465 
00466                         gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=TRUE;
00467 
00468 
00469             }
00470       }
00471 
00472       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00473       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00474 
00475       return(TRUE);
00476 }

00499 BOOLEAN FreeBackgroundRectNow(INT32 uiCount)
00500 {
00501       if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory==TRUE)
00502       {
00503             //MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea);
00504             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer)
00505                   MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea);
00506       }
00507 
00508       gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer=FALSE;
00509       gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated=FALSE;
00510       gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory=FALSE;
00511       gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=FALSE;
00512       gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea=NULL;
00513 
00514       RecountBackgrounds();
00515       return(TRUE);
00516 }

00518 BOOLEAN FreeBackgroundRectType(UINT32 uiFlags)
00519 {
00520 UINT32 uiCount;
00521 
00522       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBackSaves; uiCount++)
00523       {
00524             if(gBackSaves[uiCount].uiFlags&uiFlags)
00525             {
00526                   if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory==TRUE)
00527                   {
00528                         //MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea);
00529                         if(gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer)
00530                               MemFree(gBackSaves[uiCount].pZSaveArea);
00531                   }
00532 
00533                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fZBuffer=FALSE;
00534                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fAllocated=FALSE;
00535                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fFreeMemory=FALSE;
00536                   gBackSaves[uiCount].fFilled=FALSE;
00537                   gBackSaves[uiCount].pSaveArea=NULL;
00538             }
00539       }
00540 
00541       RecountBackgrounds();
00542       
00543       return(TRUE);
00544 }

00564 BOOLEAN ShutdownBackgroundRects(void)
00565 {

00567

00573 
00574       return(TRUE);

00581 
00582 BOOLEAN UpdateSaveBuffer(void)
00583 {
00584       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00585       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00586       UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
00587       UINT8  ubBitDepth;
00588 
00589   
00590       // Update saved buffer - do for the viewport size ony!
00591       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00592 
00593       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00594       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00595 
00596       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00597       {
00598             // BLIT HERE
00599             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00600                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00601                               0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, usWidth, ( gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y )  );
00602       }
00603       else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
00604       {
00605             // BLIT HERE
00606             Blt8BPPTo8BPP(pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00607                               pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00608                               0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, usWidth, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y );
00609       }
00610 
00611 
00612       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00613       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00614 
00615       return(TRUE);
00616 }
00617 
00618 
00619 BOOLEAN RestoreExternBackgroundRect( INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight )
00620 {
00621 
00622       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00623       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00624 
00625 
00626       Assert( ( sLeft >= 0 ) && ( sTop >= 0 ) && ( sLeft + sWidth <= SCREEN_WIDTH ) && ( sTop + sHeight <= SCREEN_HEIGHT ) );
00627 
00628       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00629       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00630 
00631       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00632       {
00633             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00634                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00635                               sLeft , sTop, 
00636                               sLeft , sTop, 
00637                               sWidth, sHeight);
00638       }
00639       else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
00640       {
00641             Blt8BPPTo8BPP(pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00642                               pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00643                               sLeft , sTop, 
00644                               sLeft , sTop, 
00645                               sWidth, sHeight);
00646       }
00647       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00648       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00649 
00650       // Add rect to frame buffer queue
00651       InvalidateRegionEx( sLeft, sTop, (sLeft + sWidth), ( sTop + sHeight ), 0 );
00652 
00653       return(TRUE);
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 BOOLEAN RestoreExternBackgroundRectGivenID( INT32 iBack )
00658 {
00659       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00660       INT16 sLeft, sTop, sWidth, sHeight;
00661       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00662 
00663 
00664       if( !gBackSaves[iBack].fAllocated )
00665       {
00666             return( FALSE );
00667       }
00668 
00669       sLeft       = gBackSaves[iBack].sLeft;
00670       sTop        = gBackSaves[iBack].sTop;
00671       sWidth      = gBackSaves[iBack].sWidth;
00672       sHeight     = gBackSaves[iBack].sHeight;
00673 
00674       Assert( ( sLeft >= 0 ) && ( sTop >= 0 ) && ( sLeft + sWidth <= SCREEN_WIDTH ) && ( sTop + sHeight <= SCREEN_HEIGHT ) );
00675 
00676       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00677       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00678 
00679       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00680       {
00681             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00682                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00683                               sLeft , sTop, 
00684                               sLeft , sTop, 
00685                               sWidth, sHeight);
00686       }
00687       else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
00688       {
00689             Blt8BPPTo8BPP(pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00690                               pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00691                               sLeft , sTop, 
00692                               sLeft , sTop, 
00693                               sWidth, sHeight);
00694       }
00695       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00696       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00697 
00698       // Add rect to frame buffer queue
00699       InvalidateRegionEx( sLeft, sTop, (sLeft + sWidth), ( sTop + sHeight ), 0 );
00700 
00701       return(TRUE);
00702 }
00703 
00704 
00705 BOOLEAN CopyExternBackgroundRect( INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight )
00706 {
00707 
00708       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00709       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00710 
00711 
00712       Assert( ( sLeft >= 0 ) && ( sTop >= 0 ) && ( sLeft + sWidth <= SCREEN_WIDTH ) && ( sTop + sHeight <= SCREEN_HEIGHT ) );
00713 
00714       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00715       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00716 
00717       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00718       {
00719             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00720                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00721                               sLeft , sTop, 
00722                               sLeft , sTop, 
00723                               sWidth, sHeight);
00724       }
00725       else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
00726       {
00727             Blt8BPPTo8BPP(pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00728                               pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00729                               sLeft , sTop, 
00730                               sLeft , sTop, 
00731                               sWidth, sHeight);
00732       }
00733       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00734       UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00735 
00736       return(TRUE);
00737 }
00738 
00739 
00740 //*****************************************************************************
00741 // gprintfdirty
00742 //
00743 //          Dirties a single-frame rect exactly the size needed to save the
00744 // background for a given call to gprintf. Note that this must be called before
00745 // the backgrounds are saved, and before the actual call to gprintf that writes
00746 // to the video buffer.
00747 //    
00748 //*****************************************************************************
00749 UINT16 gprintfdirty(INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT16 * pFontString, ...)
00750 {
00751 va_list argptr;
00752 wchar_t     string[512];
00753 UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00754 INT32 iBack;
00755 
00756       Assert(pFontString!=NULL);
00757 
00758       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
00759       vswprintf(string, (wchar_t *)pFontString, argptr);    // process gprintf string (get output str)
00760       va_end(argptr);
00761 
00762   if ( USE_WINFONTS( ) )
00763   {
00764         uiStringLength=WinFontStringPixLength( string, GET_WINFONT( ) );
00765         uiStringHeight=GetWinFontHeight( string, GET_WINFONT( ) );
00766   }
00767   else
00768   {
00769         uiStringLength=StringPixLength(string, FontDefault);
00770         uiStringHeight=GetFontHeight(FontDefault);
00771   }
00772 
00773       if ( uiStringLength > 0 )
00774       {
00775             iBack = RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, x, y, (INT16)(x + uiStringLength), (INT16)(y + uiStringHeight)); 
00776 
00777             if ( iBack != -1 )
00778             {
00779                   SetBackgroundRectFilled( iBack );
00780             }
00781       }
00782 
00783       return(uiStringLength);
00784 }
00785 
00786 UINT16 gprintfinvalidate(INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT16 * pFontString, ...)
00787 {
00788 va_list argptr;
00789 wchar_t     string[512];
00790 UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00791 
00792       Assert(pFontString!=NULL);
00793 
00794       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
00795       vswprintf(string, (wchar_t *)pFontString, argptr);    // process gprintf string (get output str)
00796       va_end(argptr);
00797 
00798       uiStringLength=StringPixLength(string, FontDefault);
00799       uiStringHeight=GetFontHeight(FontDefault);
00800 
00801       if ( uiStringLength > 0 )
00802       {
00803             InvalidateRegionEx( x, y, (INT16)(x + uiStringLength), (INT16)(y + uiStringHeight), 0 ); 
00804       }
00805       return(uiStringLength);
00806 }
00807 
00808 // explicit instantiating work around MSVC not supporting export templated functions/classes (jonathanl)
00809 
00810 UINT16 gprintfRestore(INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT16 * pFontString, ...)
00811 {
00812 va_list argptr;
00813 wchar_t     string[512];
00814 UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00815 
00816       Assert(pFontString!=NULL);
00817 
00818       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
00819       vswprintf(string, (wchar_t *)pFontString, argptr);    // process gprintf string (get output str)
00820       va_end(argptr);
00821 
00822       uiStringLength=StringPixLength(string, FontDefault);
00823       uiStringHeight=GetFontHeight(FontDefault);
00824 
00825       if ( uiStringLength > 0 )
00826       {
00827             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( x, y, uiStringLength, uiStringHeight ); 
00828       }
00829 
00830       return(uiStringLength);
00831 }
00832 
00833 
00834 // OVERLAY STUFF
00835 INT32 GetFreeVideoOverlay(void)
00836 {
00837   UINT32 uiCount;
00838 
00839       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
00840       {
00841             if((gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE ) )
00842                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00843       }
00844 
00845       if( guiNumVideoOverlays < BACKGROUND_BUFFERS )
00846             return((INT32)guiNumVideoOverlays++);
00847 
00848       return(-1);
00849 }
00850 
00851 
00852 void RecountVideoOverlays(void)
00853 {
00854   INT32 uiCount;
00855 
00856       for(uiCount=guiNumVideoOverlays-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00857       {
00858             if((gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated) )
00859             {
00860                   guiNumVideoOverlays=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00861                   break;
00862             }
00863       }
00864 }
00865 
00866 INT32 RegisterVideoOverlay( UINT32 uiFlags, VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC *pTopmostDesc )
00867 {
00868       UINT32 iBlitterIndex;
00869       UINT32 iBackIndex;
00870       UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00871 
00872       if ( uiFlags & VOVERLAY_DIRTYBYTEXT )
00873       {
00874             // Get dims by supplied text
00875             if ( pTopmostDesc->pzText == NULL )
00876             {
00877                   return( -1 );
00878             }
00879 
00880             uiStringLength=StringPixLength( pTopmostDesc->pzText, pTopmostDesc->uiFontID );
00881             uiStringHeight=GetFontHeight( pTopmostDesc->uiFontID );
00882 
00883             iBackIndex = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT, NULL, pTopmostDesc->sLeft, pTopmostDesc->sTop, (INT16)(pTopmostDesc->sLeft + uiStringLength), (INT16)(pTopmostDesc->sTop + uiStringHeight) );
00884 
00885 
00886       }
00887       else
00888       {
00889             // Register background
00890             iBackIndex = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT, NULL, pTopmostDesc->sLeft, pTopmostDesc->sTop, pTopmostDesc->sRight, pTopmostDesc->sBottom );
00891       }
00892 
00893 
00894       if ( iBackIndex == -1 )
00895       {
00896             return( -1 );
00897       }
00898 
00899 
00900       // Get next free topmost blitter index
00901       if( ( iBlitterIndex = GetFreeVideoOverlay())==(-1))
00902             return(-1);
00903 
00904       // Init new blitter
00905       memset(&gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ], 0, sizeof( VIDEO_OVERLAY ) );
00906 
00907       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiFlags                = uiFlags;
00908       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].fAllocated   = 2;
00909       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiBackground = iBackIndex;
00910       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].pBackground  = &( gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ] );
00911       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].BltCallback       = pTopmostDesc->BltCallback;
00912 
00913       // Update blitter info
00914       // Set update flags to zero since we are forcing all updates
00915       pTopmostDesc->uiFlags = 0;
00916       UpdateVideoOverlay( pTopmostDesc, iBlitterIndex , TRUE );
00917 
00918       // Set disabled flag to true 
00919       if ( uiFlags & VOVERLAY_STARTDISABLED )
00920       {
00921             gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].fDisabled       = TRUE;
00922             DisableBackgroundRect( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiBackground, TRUE );
00923       }
00924 
00925       gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiDestBuff = FRAME_BUFFER;
00926 
00927       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Register Overlay %d %S", iBlitterIndex, gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].zText ) );
00928 
00929       return( iBlitterIndex );
00930 
00931 }
00932 
00933  
00934 void SetVideoOverlayPendingDelete( INT32 iVideoOverlay )
00935 {
00936       if ( iVideoOverlay != -1 )
00937       {
00938             gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fDeletionPending = TRUE;
00939       }
00940 }
00941 
00942 void RemoveVideoOverlay( INT32 iVideoOverlay )
00943 {
00944 
00945       if ( iVideoOverlay != -1 && gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fAllocated )
00946       {
00947             // Check if we are actively scrolling
00948             if ( gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fActivelySaving )
00949             {
00950 
00951       //          DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Overlay Actively saving %d %S", iVideoOverlay, gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].zText ) );
00952 
00953                   gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fDeletionPending = TRUE;
00954             }
00955             else
00956             {
00957                   //RestoreExternBackgroundRectGivenID( gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].uiBackground );
00958 
00959                   // Remove background
00960                   FreeBackgroundRect( gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].uiBackground );
00961             
00962                   //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Delete Overlay %d %S", iVideoOverlay, gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].zText ) );
00963 
00964 
00965                   // Remove save buffer if not done so
00966                   if ( gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].pSaveArea != NULL )
00967                   {
00968                         MemFree( gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].pSaveArea );
00969                   }
00970                   gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].pSaveArea = NULL;
00971 
00972 
00973                   // Set as not allocated
00974                   gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fAllocated   = FALSE;
00975             }
00976       }
00977 }
00978 
00979 
00980 BOOLEAN UpdateVideoOverlay( VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC *pTopmostDesc, UINT32 iBlitterIndex, BOOLEAN fForceAll )
00981 {
00982       UINT32 uiFlags;
00983       UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00984 
00985       if ( iBlitterIndex != -1 )
00986       {
00987 
00988             if ( !gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].fAllocated )
00989             {
00990                   return( FALSE );
00991             }
00992 
00993             uiFlags = pTopmostDesc->uiFlags;
00994 
00995             if ( fForceAll )
00996             {
00997                   gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiFontID     = pTopmostDesc->uiFontID;
00998                   gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].sX                           = pTopmostDesc->sX;
00999                   gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].sY                           = pTopmostDesc->sY;
01000                   gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].ubFontBack       = pTopmostDesc->ubFontBack;
01001                   gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].ubFontFore       = pTopmostDesc->ubFontFore;
01002 
01003                   if ( pTopmostDesc->pzText != NULL )
01004                   {
01005                         wcscpy( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].zText, pTopmostDesc->pzText );
01006                   }
01007             }
01008             else
01009             {
01010                   if ( uiFlags & VOVERLAY_DESC_TEXT )
01011                   {
01012                         if ( pTopmostDesc->pzText != NULL )
01013                         {
01014                               wcscpy( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].zText, pTopmostDesc->pzText );
01015                         }
01016                   }
01017 
01018 
01019                   if ( uiFlags & VOVERLAY_DESC_DISABLED )
01020                   {
01021                         gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].fDisabled = pTopmostDesc->fDisabled;
01022                         DisableBackgroundRect( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiBackground, pTopmostDesc->fDisabled );
01023                   }
01024 
01025                   // If position has changed and flags are of type that use dirty rects, adjust
01026                   if ( ( uiFlags & VOVERLAY_DESC_POSITION ) )
01027                   {
01028 
01029                         if ( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiFlags & VOVERLAY_DIRTYBYTEXT )
01030                         {
01031                               // Get dims by supplied text
01032                               if ( pTopmostDesc->pzText == NULL )
01033                               {
01034                                     return( FALSE );
01035                               }
01036 
01037                               uiStringLength=StringPixLength( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].zText,gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiFontID );
01038                               uiStringHeight=GetFontHeight( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiFontID );
01039 
01040                               // Delete old rect
01041                               // Remove background
01042                               FreeBackgroundRectPending( gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiBackground );
01043 
01044                               gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].uiBackground = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT, NULL, pTopmostDesc->sLeft, pTopmostDesc->sTop, (INT16)(pTopmostDesc->sLeft + uiStringLength), (INT16)(pTopmostDesc->sTop + uiStringHeight) );
01045                               gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].sX                           = pTopmostDesc->sX;
01046                               gVideoOverlays[ iBlitterIndex ].sY                           = pTopmostDesc->sY;
01047 
01048                         }
01049 
01050                   }
01051 
01052             }
01053 
01054       }
01055       return( TRUE );
01056 }
01057 
01058 
01059 // FUnctions for entrie array of blitters
01060 void ExecuteVideoOverlays( )
01061 {
01062       UINT32 uiCount;
01063 
01064       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01065       {
01066             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated )
01067             {
01068                         if ( !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01069                         {
01070                               // If we are scrolling but havn't saved yet, don't!
01071                               if ( !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fActivelySaving && gfScrollInertia > 0 )
01072                               {
01073                                     continue;
01074                               }
01075 
01076                               // ATE: Wait a frame before executing!
01077                               if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated == 1 )
01078                               {
01079                                     // Call Blit Function
01080                                     (*(gVideoOverlays[uiCount].BltCallback ) ) ( &(gVideoOverlays[uiCount]) );
01081                               }
01082                               else if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated == 2 )
01083                               {
01084                                      gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated = 1;
01085                               }
01086                         }
01087 
01088                         // Remove if pending
01089                         //if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDeletionPending )
01090                         //{
01091                         //    RemoveVideoOverlay( uiCount );
01092                         //}
01093             }
01094       }
01095 
01096 }
01097 
01098 
01099 void ExecuteVideoOverlaysToAlternateBuffer( UINT32 uiNewDestBuffer )
01100 {
01101       UINT32  uiCount;
01102       UINT32      uiOldDestBuffer;
01103 
01104       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01105       {
01106             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01107             {
01108                   if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fActivelySaving )
01109                   {
01110                         uiOldDestBuffer =  gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiDestBuff;
01111 
01112                         gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiDestBuff = uiNewDestBuffer;
01113 
01114                         // Call Blit Function
01115                    (*(gVideoOverlays[uiCount].BltCallback ) ) ( &(gVideoOverlays[uiCount]) );
01116 
01117                         gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiDestBuff = uiOldDestBuffer;
01118                   }
01119             }
01120       }
01121 
01122 }
01123 
01124 void AllocateVideoOverlaysArea( )
01125 {
01126       UINT32 uiCount;
01127       UINT32 uiBufSize;
01128       UINT32 iBackIndex;
01129 
01130       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01131       {
01132             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01133             {
01134                   iBackIndex = gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiBackground;
01135 
01136                   // Get buffer size
01137                   uiBufSize=(( gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sRight-gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sLeft)*2)*(gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sBottom-gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sTop );
01138 
01139                   gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fActivelySaving = TRUE;
01140 
01141                   //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Setting Overlay Actively saving %d %S", uiCount, gVideoOverlays[ uiCount ].zText ) );
01142 
01143                   // Allocate
01144                   if( ( gVideoOverlays[ uiCount ].pSaveArea = (INT16 *) MemAlloc( uiBufSize ) ) == NULL )
01145                   {
01146                         continue;   
01147                   }
01148             }
01149       }
01150 
01151 }
01152 
01153 
01154 void AllocateVideoOverlayArea( UINT32 uiCount )
01155 {
01156       UINT32 uiBufSize;
01157       UINT32 iBackIndex;
01158 
01159       if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01160       {
01161             iBackIndex = gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiBackground;
01162 
01163             // Get buffer size
01164             uiBufSize=(( gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sRight-gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sLeft)*2)*(gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sBottom-gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sTop );
01165 
01166             gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fActivelySaving = TRUE;
01167 
01168             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Setting Overlay Actively saving %d %S", uiCount, gVideoOverlays[ uiCount ].zText ) );
01169 
01170             // Allocate
01171             if( ( gVideoOverlays[ uiCount ].pSaveArea = (INT16 *) MemAlloc( uiBufSize ) ) == NULL )
01172             {
01173             }
01174       }
01175 
01176 }
01177 
01178 
01179 void SaveVideoOverlaysArea( UINT32 uiSrcBuffer )
01180 {
01181       UINT32 uiCount;
01182       UINT32 iBackIndex;
01183       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES;
01184       UINT8  *pSrcBuf;
01185 
01186       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiSrcBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES );
01187 
01188       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01189       {
01190             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01191             {
01192                   // OK, if our saved area is null, allocate it here!
01193                   if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea == NULL )
01194                   {
01195                         AllocateVideoOverlayArea( uiCount );
01196                   }
01197 
01198                   if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
01199                   {
01200                               iBackIndex = gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiBackground;
01201 
01202                               // Save data from frame buffer!
01203                               Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea, gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth*2,
01204                                                 (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,
01205                                                 0, 0, 
01206                                                 gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sLeft , gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sTop, 
01207                                                 gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth, gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sHeight );
01208                   }
01209             }
01210       }
01211 
01212       UnLockVideoSurface( uiSrcBuffer );
01213 
01214 }
01215 
01216 
01217 void SaveVideoOverlayArea( UINT32 uiSrcBuffer, UINT32 uiCount )
01218 {
01219       UINT32 iBackIndex;
01220       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES;
01221       UINT8  *pSrcBuf;
01222 
01223       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiSrcBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES );
01224 
01225       if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01226       {
01227             // OK, if our saved area is null, allocate it here!
01228             if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea == NULL )
01229             {
01230                   AllocateVideoOverlayArea( uiCount );
01231             }
01232 
01233             if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
01234             {
01235 
01236                         iBackIndex = gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiBackground;
01237 
01238                         // Save data from frame buffer!
01239                         Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea, gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth*2,
01240                                           (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,
01241                                           0, 0, 
01242                                           gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sLeft , gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sTop, 
01243                                           gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth, gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sHeight );
01244             }
01245       }
01246 
01247       UnLockVideoSurface( uiSrcBuffer );
01248 
01249 }
01250 
01251 
01252 void DeleteVideoOverlaysArea( )
01253 {
01254       UINT32 uiCount;
01255 
01256       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01257       {
01258             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01259             {
01260                   if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
01261                   {
01262                         MemFree( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea );
01263                   }
01264 
01265                   gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fActivelySaving = FALSE;
01266 
01267                   gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea = NULL;
01268 
01269                   //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Removing Overlay Actively saving %d %S", uiCount, gVideoOverlays[ uiCount ].zText ) );
01270 
01271                   // Remove if pending
01272                   if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDeletionPending )
01273                   {
01274                         RemoveVideoOverlay( uiCount );
01275                   }
01276 
01277             }
01278       }
01279 
01280 }
01281 
01282 
01283 BOOLEAN RestoreShiftedVideoOverlays( INT16 sShiftX, INT16 sShiftY ) 
01284 {
01285       UINT32 uiCount, uiDestPitchBYTES;
01286       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
01287       UINT32 iBackIndex;
01288 
01289       INT32  ClipX1, ClipY1, ClipX2, ClipY2;
01290       INT32 uiLeftSkip, uiRightSkip, uiTopSkip, uiBottomSkip;
01291       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
01292       INT32  iTempX, iTempY;
01293       INT16       sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom;
01294 
01295       ClipX1= 0;
01296       ClipY1= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01297       ClipX2= SCREEN_WIDTH;
01298       ClipY2= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - 1;
01299 
01300 
01301       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
01302 
01303       for(uiCount=0; uiCount <  guiNumVideoOverlays; uiCount++)
01304       {
01305             if( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fAllocated && !gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDisabled )
01306             {
01307                         iBackIndex = gVideoOverlays[uiCount].uiBackground;
01308 
01309 
01310                         if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea != NULL )
01311                         {
01312                               // Get restore background values
01313                               sLeft             = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sLeft;
01314                               sTop          = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sTop;
01315                               sRight            = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sRight;
01316                               sBottom           = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sBottom;
01317                               usHeight  = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sHeight;
01318                               usWidth   = gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth;
01319 
01320 
01321                               // Clip!!
01322                               iTempX = sLeft + sShiftX;
01323                               iTempY = sTop + sShiftY;
01324 
01325                               // Clip to rect
01326                               uiLeftSkip=__min( ClipX1 - min(ClipX1, iTempX), (INT32)usWidth);
01327                               uiRightSkip=__min(max(ClipX2, (iTempX+(INT32)usWidth)) - ClipX2, (INT32)usWidth);
01328                               uiTopSkip=__min(ClipY1 - __min(ClipY1, iTempY), (INT32)usHeight);
01329                               uiBottomSkip=__min(__max(ClipY2, (iTempY+(INT32)usHeight)) - ClipY2, (INT32)usHeight);
01330 
01331                               // check if whole thing is clipped
01332                               if((uiLeftSkip >=(INT32)usWidth) || (uiRightSkip >=(INT32)usWidth))     
01333                                     continue;
01334 
01335                               // check if whole thing is clipped
01336                               if((uiTopSkip >=(INT32)usHeight) || (uiBottomSkip >=(INT32)usHeight))   
01337                                     continue;
01338 
01339                               // Set re-set values given based on clipping
01340                               sLeft    = iTempX + (INT16)uiLeftSkip;
01341                               sTop     = iTempY + (INT16)uiTopSkip;
01342                               sRight   = sRight + sShiftX - (INT16)uiRightSkip;
01343                               sBottom  = sBottom + sShiftY - (INT16)uiBottomSkip;
01344 
01345                               usHeight = sBottom - sTop;
01346                               usWidth  = sRight -  sLeft;
01347 
01348                               if(gbPixelDepth==16)
01349                               {
01350 
01351                                     Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)(UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES,
01352                                                       (UINT16 *)gVideoOverlays[uiCount].pSaveArea, gBackSaves[ iBackIndex ].sWidth*2,
01353                                                       sLeft, sTop,                                          
01354                                                       uiLeftSkip, uiTopSkip, 
01355                                                       usWidth, usHeight );
01356 
01357                               }
01358                               else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
01359                               {
01360 
01361                               }
01362 
01363                               // Once done, check for pending deletion
01364                               if ( gVideoOverlays[uiCount].fDeletionPending )
01365                               {
01366                                     RemoveVideoOverlay( uiCount );
01367                               }
01368 
01369                         }
01370             }
01371 
01372       }
01373 
01374       UnLockVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER );
01375       
01376       return(TRUE);
01377 }
01378 
01379 BOOLEAN SetOverlayUserData( INT32 iVideoOverlay, UINT8 ubNum, UINT32 uiData )
01380 {
01381       if ( !gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].fAllocated )
01382       {
01383             return( FALSE );
01384       }
01385 
01386       if ( ubNum > 4 )
01387       {
01388             return( FALSE );
01389       }
01390 
01391       gVideoOverlays[ iVideoOverlay ].uiUserData[ ubNum ] = uiData;
01392 
01393       return ( TRUE );
01394 }

01397 // Common callbacks for topmost blitters
01398 void BlitMFont( VIDEO_OVERLAY *pBlitter )
01399 {
01400       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
01401       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01402 
01403       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( pBlitter->uiDestBuff, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
01404 
01405       SetFont( pBlitter->uiFontID );
01406       SetFontBackground( pBlitter->ubFontBack );
01407       SetFontForeground( pBlitter->ubFontFore );
01408 
01409       mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pBlitter->uiFontID, pBlitter->sX, pBlitter->sY, pBlitter->zText );
01410 
01411       UnLockVideoSurface( pBlitter->uiDestBuff );
01412 
01413 }
01414 
01415 
01416 BOOLEAN BlitBufferToBuffer(UINT32 uiSrcBuffer, UINT32 uiDestBuffer, UINT16 usSrcX, UINT16 usSrcY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight)
01417 {
01418       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
01419       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
01420       BOOLEAN fRetVal;
01421 
01422       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(uiDestBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
01423       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(uiSrcBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
01424 
01425       fRetVal = Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, (UINT16*)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,
01426                   usSrcX, usSrcY, 
01427                   usSrcX, usSrcY, 
01428                   usWidth, usHeight);
01429 
01430       UnLockVideoSurface(uiDestBuffer);
01431       UnLockVideoSurface(uiSrcBuffer);
01432 
01433       return( fRetVal );
01434 }

01436 
01437 void EnableVideoOverlay( BOOLEAN fEnable, INT32 iOverlayIndex )
01438 {
01439       VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC            VideoOverlayDesc;
01440 
01441       memset( &VideoOverlayDesc, 0, sizeof( VideoOverlayDesc ) );
01442 
01443 
01444       // enable or disable
01445       VideoOverlayDesc.fDisabled    = !fEnable;
01446       
01447       // go play with enable/disable state
01448       VideoOverlayDesc.uiFlags    = VOVERLAY_DESC_DISABLED;
01449       
01450       UpdateVideoOverlay( &VideoOverlayDesc, iOverlayIndex, FALSE );
01451 
01452 }
